Package store.business.gui.controller

Class VirtualStoreController

  • java.lang.Object
    • store.business.gui.controller.VirtualStoreController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class VirtualStoreController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable

    The main controller of the FXML App

    The public class VirtualStoreController class implements the public interface Initializable interface in order to setup our ComboBox<?>. It handle Button, Text Area and Text Input mouse events / context menu events

    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Dray Raphael
    See Also:
    Initializable, FXML, Logger, ProductParser, ClientParser, Parser, Client, Product, Transaction, TransactionWriter, ClientWriter, Logger
